name: Run Robber
description: A robber has steal something and you must stop it. To do so, you must throw him the police, literally. The police is so useless, that you have to literally throw them to the robber. Each key of the keyboard is a police. You must find the key, I mean, the police, that will catch the robber, cause just one of them do. But hurry, you only have a few seconds.
